poem:
Title: "Ballad of The Abandoned Sphere"

In the shadow of London's dear St. Paul,
a Sphere dream was to stand tall.
But against the ancient city's will,
Dolan's endeavor was made still.
A billionaire's tribute to Madison's glory,
becomes a departed, orb-less story.
With common sense we must engage,
Lest an errant Sphere becomes the stage.
With every failure, wisdom is gained,
Still, the skyline remains unstained.
